snippet.title: Smashy Drift trailer
snippet.description:
Drift, tank and even zombies! Get ready to drive legendary cars.
Welcome to SMASHY DRIFT, an endless drift racing game.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.akpublish.smashydrift

Race through different locations: cities, uptowns, battlefields and highways.
Survive in driftapocalypse, drift on tank, destroy touge track, make wall taps and 360 spins.

Collect power-ups and see if you can beat your friends highscore in the online leaderboards!

KEY FEATURES:
- Over 20 unlockable vehicles!!
- Special locations and features for epic cars
- Drifting elements: wall taps and 360
- New content coming soon!

Get the racing game now for free and become drift king!

FOLLOW US:
https://www.facebook.com/smashydrift/
